citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:40am on January
29, 2021.
The Inspector arrived at the facility at 9:40am and spoke to a facility representative by phone. The representative stated
that there was no one available to facilitate an inspection on this date as several key personnel were unavailable.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission  of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:40am on January 
29, 2021. 
 
The Inspector arrived  at the facility at 9:40am and spoke to a facility representative  by phone.  The representative  stated 
that there was no one available to facilitate an inspection on this date as several key personnel were unavailable. 
 
 
 
End Section
